verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Behold You have come over the hills, upon the mountain
To me, You will run
My Beloved, You've captured my heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Won't You dance with me
Oh, Lover of my soul
To the song of all songs?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
With You I will go
You are my Love, You are my Fair One
The winter has passed and the springtime has come

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Won't You dance with me
Oh, Lover of my soul,
To the song of all songs?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Romance me
Oh, Lover of my soul
To the song of all songs
